name: Temple builder
description:
Temple builder was made in about 3 hours for Trijam #209: The 3 hour game jam

Have you ever dreamed about building your own temple to the Greek gods?  Well, you're in luck! This is a sandbox game in which you can build the temple of your dreams. Or at least a temple-esk pile of rubble... 

The game has no win or lose condition. Just do what you want. Hope you enjoy! And thanks for playing!

The game can be played with the mouse (it only uses the left mouse button).

- Press the buttons at the top of the screen to get more building blocks. 

- Move the objects by drag and dropping them.

- To remove a building block just trow it out of the map.

The current build has a small bug which locks the newly spawned object to the mouse position. If you want to drop them, press the mouse button. That Resets the  issue.
